nodes.text: The big game hunter Gozetta owned a sleek blunt-nosed shuttle. It was black and gold, with platinum bearings, had eight ion engines, and a rear hatch. Its design greatly resembled the Botajef SS-54 assault ship.
The shuttle was destroyed during a fight with a giant Stinker on Xirl around 18 BBY.

Gozetta's shuttle first appeared in Tom Huddleston's novel Adventures in Wild Space: The Nest, the second entry in the Star Wars: Adventures in Wild Space series. The ship did not have name in the novel, but Huddleston offered a fan who asked him on Twitter to come up with one. Said fan ended up proposing Gilded Strega, which Huddleston approved of.
